subject: Harness Racing
lead_paragraph: The three-horse entry of Hard Livin’, Senor Glide and On the Tab has been made the 6-5 favorite in a field of eight for Saturday’s Yonkers Trot, the first leg of trotting’s Triple Crown.
snippet: The three-horse entry of Hard Livin’, Senor Glide and On the Tab has been made the 6-5 favorite in a field of eight for Saturday’s Yonkers Trot, the first leg of trotting’s Triple Crown.
